name: Healing Potion
description: A classic restorative. The plant and residuum are ground, mixed into water, and heated to create a potent healing draught.

name: Healing Salve
description: A topical ointment. The plant is cooked down with animal fat, creating a salve that can be applied to wounds.

name: Contact Poison
description: A dangerous substance. A venom gland is heated with animal fat until dissolved. Requires careful handling and a Constitution save on mishap.

name: Infused Spoon of Cleansing
description: A magical infusion. A caster channels Prestidigitation into pure silver while a Jeweler shapes it, creating a spoon that can purify food and drink.

name: The Bolt Caster
ingredients: Dragon scale (Rare), Pure gem (Rare), Magic Missile spell
description: A powerful single-use item. A Smith forges a bolt from a dragon scale, and a caster infuses it with a Magic Missile spell, storing one charge.

name: Amulet of the Leaping Hunter
ingredients: Beast heart (Very Rare), Pure gold, Jump spell
description: A rare magical amulet. A caster infuses a perfectly preserved beast heart with the Jump spell, allowing the wearer to cast it once per long rest.
